++ Vecnas Phylactery

A deep purple colored glass cube that pulses with a soft glow. 

Attunement:
-A character in contact with this item is ethereal
-An attuned character has one additional level 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 spell slots
-Resistance against Radiant Damage
-Ability to grapple souls using Wisdom
-+2 Wisdom
-20ft fly speed

if [Vecna]'s avatar is slain, it will re-emerge from this Phylactery in 1d10 days
